CustomField.description: The type of Attribute Assignment Rule. Supported Types are: Field - Field Value will be applied as the Attribute's Value. Formula - Result of the Formula will be applied as the Attributes Value. For On-Off Attributes, if formula resolves to >= 1 or true then it will apply the Attribute. By Default all formulas have available all Fields on the SObject being evaluated. See below for further formula info. Tracking Formula - Same as above except that Tracking Formula's will be run against all Tracking entries related to the SObject being evaluated.
CustomField.label: Type
